name: Game Boy Advance Video: Pokémon: Volume 1
overview: Pokémon GBA Video: For Ho-Oh The Bells Toll!/Hot Water Battle is a collection of two great Pokémon episodes you can watch on your Game Boy Advance. Enjoy skip-free viewing while you travel - the screen will never jump or skip, no matter how much you move your GBA around. No additional hardware or attachments are required -- just your GBA!
